content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE Chinese practice that promotes good health (Group Dance, tai chi, qigong, etc.). In your presentation, describe this practice and explain its significance. Prompt 1

frqParts.text: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE Chinese practice that promotes good health (Group Dance, tai chi, qigong, etc.). In your presentation, describe this practice and explain its significance. Prompt 1

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
